## HallClient.requestMatch() method

请求匹配，返回匹配请求ID，用queryMatch查询匹配结果，建议2秒一次查询

**Signature:**

```typescript
requestMatch(playerToken: string, matchParams: IMatchParamsFromPlayer): Promise<IResult<string>>;
```
